content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Crude Oil Extraction Structure at position (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
- Pumpjack at position (17.5, 40.5)
- Storage Tank at position (20.5, 40.5)
- PipeGroup at position (19.5, 38.5) connecting Pumpjack to Storage Tank
- Small Electric Pole at positions (18.5, 42.5) and (20.5, 42.5)

### Copper Ore Mine at position (-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric Mining Drill at position (-46.5, 70.5)

### Copper Plate Smelting at position (21.5, 44.5)
Consists of:
- Electric Furnace at position (21.5, 44.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the item to be inserted is compatible with the entity's inventory.

### Errors when placing entities without having them in inventory
- Ensure the entity to be placed is in the inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when electric mining drills or other electric entities are not working
- Ensure electric entities are connected to a power network before attempting to use them.

### Errors when furnaces are out of fuel or ingredients
- Ensure furnaces have sufficient fuel and ingredients before attempting to smelt items.

### Errors when pumpjacks are not working
- Ensure pumpjacks are receiving electricity and are properly connected to the fluid system.

### Errors when entities are not properly connected
- Ensure entities are properly connected according to their connection points and fluid boxes.

### Errors when accessing non-existent attributes of entities or undefined variables
- Ensure the attribute exists for the entity and all variables are defined before using them.

### Errors when entities are not in the correct status for an operation
- Ensure entities are in the correct status (e.g., not disabled or without power) before performing operations on them.

## NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
